role: Product designer, writer and coffee geek
about: I was born and still live in the city of Criciúma, in Santa Catarina, together with my wife, my dog Amora, and my cat Figma. I've been working with product design since 2016, and I'm currently a senior at Locaweb, responsible for the KingHost dashboard and app, as well as the design system.

lets-ui-description: Let’s UI is a complete, open-source multibranding design system, created to make interfaces fully fluid.
book-description: This book covers everything from initial planning, style and token definition, to components, microinteractions, and documentation, showing how multidisciplinary teams can work efficiently.
book-accent: Discover the universe of design systems and how they go beyond simple visual standardization.
book-description-1: Aimed at designers, developers, managers, and curious minds, this book covers everything from initial planning, style and token definition, to components, microinteractions, and documentation, showing how multidisciplinary teams can work efficiently.
book-description-2: More than a tool guide, you have in your hands all the strategic and practical knowledge needed to turn theory into practice, building consistent digital products and strengthening the relationship with users.
